text: Celestial Dragon Guard (Swords)
One of the main forces of the Celestial Army, these soldiers are the blade of the Dragon Emperor's elite.
Celestial Dragon Vanguard
The Celestial Dragon Vanguard is invincible in battle, but they require the cover of crossbows and shields.
Thunderbolt Gunners
The Thunderbolt Gunners are skilled in using firearms and relies on infantry in front to defend against enemies.
Peasant Scouts
Peasant Scouts excel at ambushes, striking first and making it impossible for the enemy to find them.
Terracotta Guardians
When grouped together, these Terracotta soldiers are unstoppable, capable of overwhelming any enemy with their sheer power.
Golden Crow Handgunners
Forged by the blacksmiths of Nan-Gau, these firearms can destroy enemies from a thousand miles away. The elite troops of Changyuan are unmatched in their accuracy.
Celestial Dragon Axes

The Celestial Dragon Axes carries out the Dragon Emperor's mission with iron resolve, swearing to defend Cathay to the death, though their skills are still developing, relying on a limited number of powerful strikes.
Great Bastion Custodians
The soul of Changyuan in Cathay, these troops form impenetrable shield walls and spear formations that no enemy dares to break through.
Mounted Jade Crossbowmen
Swift as the wind, calm as the forest, fierce as fire, and unmovable as a mountain.
Mounted Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen
The elite troops of the Dragon Emperor, veterans of countless battles, and the best of the cavalry.
Celestial Jinwu Guard
The Dragon Emperor's elite guard, skilled at combating infantry, but struggle against large beasts.
Jade Longma Crossbowmen
Equipped with the divine weapons of Nan-Gau, they can rain arrows upon their enemies.
Jade Warriors (Greatswords)
The use of the great sword is the opposite of spear and shield. It reveals its full potential when positioned at the back of the formation.
Celestal Dragon Guard (Sword Breakers)
The Celestal Dragon Guard wields dual maces and excels at breaking through heavy armor.
Celestal Dragon Demon Slayers
Those who wield the iron whip can strike down demons and break through evil forces, unmatched by any.
Celestal Dragon Guard (Dual Hammers)

Those who wield dual hammers are as strong as gods, possessing immense power. With the strength of four elephants, they can crush iron as if it were mud, surpassing even the strength of the legendary Xiang Yu.
Hook Shield Guard
Wielding hook-claws in battle, they can defend against slashing attacks, but without armor, they must avoid enemy arrows.
Xiaoguo Guard
The Xiaoguo Guard is the imperial guard of Weijing, skilled in wielding the lance and fighting on horseback, capable of taking on ten enemies at once.
Nan-Gau Fire Lancers
The craftsmen of Nan-Gau have created the divine weapons of this era. Demons flee at their sight.
Nan-Gau Explosive Crossbowmen
The Nan-Gau crafted these decisive weapons, capable of overwhelming enemies with immense force.
Moon Empress Maidens
Skilled in dual swordsmanship, they can imbue their arrows with the power of Yin and Yang, killing enemies before they even see them.
Celestial Fire Lances
Capable of both ranged and melee attacks, these elite troops of Nan-Gau have fought alongside Miao Ying  in multiple battles against Chaos.
Wu Xing Siege Compass
The Five Elements War Compass unleashes firepower comparable to a cannon.
Armored Onyx Crowmen
Some Onyx Crowmen are like spies lurking in the dark, delivering deadly strikes when the enemy least expects it.
Terracotta Sentry
Positioned along the Great Bastion, they scout enemies from miles away, with watchtowers spread every ten miles, forming an extensive network.
Sky Ark
Driven by the power of the Celestial Minister, this ship is the most powerful vessel in all of Cathay, though its sighting is rare due to the scarcity of Celestial Ministers.
Sky Boats
Powered by the force of the Taiyue Luan, the Sky Boats are often used for patrolling the area around the Great Bastion, allowing for extensive surveillance.
Celestial Lion Riders
In the forest of Haoyue, there are those skilled in taming the Celestial Lions.
